subject: Doping (Sports)
Bicycles and Bicycling
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Jan Ullrich of Germany, who won the 1997 Tour de France but has since retired from cycling, was suspended for two years on Thursday in a largely symbolic move.
snippet: Jan Ullrich of Germany, who won the 1997 Tour de France but has since retired from cycling, was suspended for two years on Thursday in a largely symbolic move.
